markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced General Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=4489) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 65 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Over the long course of your adventuring life, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities. You gain a  [general feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=78) of 7th level or lower. You must meet the feat’s prerequisites.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different feat each time.
name: Advanced General Training
